data.title: Panzer General: Allied Assault
meta_keywords: Panzer General: Allied Assault board game reviews
Panzer General: Allied Assault board game
data.meta_description: Panzer General: Allied Assault Board Game - Win World War II with the turn of a card in this officially licensed board game based off of the hit SSI computer game. Based on the Xbox LIVE® Arcade game published by UBISOFT.
